original_text: While they were trying to kill him, news reached the commander of the Roman troops that the whole city of Jerusalem was in an uproar.
korean_text: 그들이 그를 죽이려 할 때에 온 예루살렘이 요란하다는 소문이 군대의 천부장에게 들리매
